links: Vladimir Kruchinin, D. V. Kruchinin, Composita and their properties , arXiv:1103.2582
formula: a(n):=sum(binomial(n,k)*(if n=k then 1 else if oddp(n-k) then 0 else sum(sum(binomial(m,j)*2^(1-j)*sum((-1)^((n-k)/2)*binomial(j,i)*(j-2*i)^(n-k),i,0,floor((j-1)/2))*(-1)^(m-j),j,1,m)*(-1)^m*binomial(k+m-1,k-1),m,1,n-k)),k,1,n), n>0 [From _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 12 2010]
prog: (Maxima) a(n):=sum(binomial(n,k)*(if n=k then 1 else if oddp(n-k) then 0 else sum(sum(binomial(m,j)*2^(1-j)*sum((-1)^((n-k)/2)*binomial(j,i)*(j-2*i)^(n-k),i,0,floor((j-1)/2))*(-1)^(m-j),j,1,m)*(-1)^m*binomial(k+m-1,k-1),m,1,n-k)),k,1,n); [From _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 12 2010]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
